trans-unit.source: “Sticky widgets” aka “pinned” NewsItems in widgets: You can use the admin UI to make certain NewsItems stay visible in the widget permanently or until an expiration date that you set.
trans-unit.target: 小部件中的“固定小部件”或“固定”新闻项目：您可以使用管理界面使某些新闻项目在小部件中永久可见，或者直到您设置的到期日期为止。

trans-unit.source: ) and returns a
trans-unit.target: ）并返回一个

trans-unit.source: , (currently only handles CSV and old-style Excel sheets; not .xslx) (Ticket #274)
trans-unit.target: ，（当前仅处理CSV和旧式Excel工作表；不适用于.xslx）（票号274）

trans-unit.source: , see
trans-unit.target: ，请参阅

trans-unit.target: ，在哪里

trans-unit.source: . Ticket #211
. Ticket #253
../main/widgets
trans-unit.target: ../main/widgets

trans-unit.source: /streets/ list doesn’t blow up if you haven’t set DEFAULT_LOCTYPE_SLUG.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未设置DEFAULT_LOCTYPE_SLUG，则/ streets /列表不会爆炸。

trans-unit.source: ; some things might really only have a title available.
trans-unit.target: ; 有些事情实际上可能只有标题可用。

trans-unit.source: A Django application that provides hyperlocal news.
trans-unit.target: 一个提供超本地新闻的Django应用。

trans-unit.source: About the Project
trans-unit.target: 关于项目

trans-unit.source: Add Vary headers to REST API responses, for more correct HTTP cache-ability.
trans-unit.target: 在REST API响应中添加Vary头,以获得更正确的HTTP缓存能力。

trans-unit.source: Add a “properties” JSON field to the Profile model, for more flexible per-user metadata.
trans-unit.target: 向配置文件模型添加“属性” JSON字段，以获取更灵活的每用户元数据。

trans-unit.source: Added
trans-unit.target: 新增

trans-unit.source: Added ‘prefix’ to the Streets models, used for things like “State Hwy” in the US census TIGER data; without it, we were getting geocoding failures, confusing/ambigous street names in the UI, etc. Closes #264.
trans-unit.target: 在Streets模型中添加了“前缀”，用于美国人口普查TIGER数据中的“州立高速公路”之类的事物；没有它，我们会遇到地址解析失败，UI中的街道名称混乱/模糊等问题。关闭＃264。

trans-unit.source: Added a
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个

trans-unit.source: Added a “View selected items on map” link and checkboxes on Schema filter pages, to allow viewing explicitly selected items on the “big map”.
trans-unit.target: 在模式过滤器页面上添加了“在地图上查看选定的项目”链接和复选框，以允许在“大地图”上查看明确选择的项目。

trans-unit.source: Added a generic spreadsheet scraper in
trans-unit.target: 中添加了一个通用的电子表格刮擦器。

trans-unit.source: Added advanced hook for filtering schemas based on arbitrary request data; implement this by assigning
trans-unit.target: 添加了基于任意请求数据过滤模式的高级钩子;通过分配到的

trans-unit.source: Added an admin UI for importing NewsItems from spreadsheets (currently only handles CSV and old-style Excel sheets; not .xslx) (Ticket #126)
trans-unit.target: 增加了从电子表格导入NewsItems的管理界面(目前只处理CSV和旧式Excel表格,不处理.xslx)(Ticket #126)

trans-unit.source: Added docs on all the settings in settings_default.py.
trans-unit.target: 在settings_default.py中添加了所有设置的文档。

trans-unit.source: Added ebpub.utils.geodjango:interpolate() function which finds the point on a linestring that’s the given distance (or fraction) from the first point. (Adds dependency on Shapely, since otherwise this would require a database call.)
trans-unit.target: 添加了ebpub.utils.geodjango：interpolate（）函数，该函数查找线串上与第一个点的给定距离（或分数）的点。（增加了对Shapely的依赖，因为否则将需要数据库调用。）

trans-unit.source: Added new
trans-unit.target: 增加了新的

trans-unit.source: Admin UI now provides links to view various things (NewsItems, Locations, Blocks, Streets, LocationTypes) on the live site.
trans-unit.target: 管理界面现在提供了链接来查看直播网站上的各种东西(新闻条目、地点、区块、街道、LocationTypes)。

trans-unit.source: Admin UI option to save a copy of a schema as a new schema.
trans-unit.target: 管理界面选项可以将一个模式的副本保存为一个新的模式。

trans-unit.source: Admin users no longer have a limit on file upload size.
trans-unit.target: 管理用户不再有文件上传大小的限制。

trans-unit.source: Allow choosing multiple values when filtering via Lookups. Ticket # 267.
trans-unit.target: 允许通过查找过滤时选择多个值。Ticket#267.

trans-unit.source: Allow overriding the template for schema_filter view on a per-schema basis, by creating a template named db/schema_filter/<schema>.html
trans-unit.target: 通过创建名为db / schema_filter / <schema> .html的模板，允许按架构覆盖schema_filter视图的模板。

trans-unit.source: As usual, install all dependencies, eg if you are upgrading a source checkout:
trans-unit.target: 像往常一样,安装所有的依赖关系,例如,如果你要升级一个源码检查。

trans-unit.source: As usual, sync and migrate the database:
trans-unit.target: 像往常一样,同步并迁移数据库。

trans-unit.source: At least put the darn geocoder cache results in the admin so you can delete them manually if desired. Refs #163
trans-unit.target: 至少把该死的geocoder缓存结果放在管理中,这样你就可以根据需要手动删除它们。参考文献#163

trans-unit.source: Auto-complete categories on the “neighbornews” add/edit forms.
trans-unit.target: “邻居”添加/编辑表单上的自动完成类别。

trans-unit.source: Back up your database
trans-unit.target: 备份您的数据库

trans-unit.source: Backward Incompatibilities
trans-unit.target: 向后的不兼容性

trans-unit.source: Basic docs for
trans-unit.target: 基本文件

trans-unit.source: Be sure to also regenerate the Streets, BlockIntersections, and Intersections as per the docs.
trans-unit.target: 请务必按照文档中的要求重新生成街道、街区交叉口和交叉口。

trans-unit.source: Better docs about template overrides, see
trans-unit.target: 关于模板覆盖的更好的文档,参见

trans-unit.source: Better docs on how to import spreadsheets via scraper or admin.
trans-unit.target: 关于如何通过scraper或admin导入电子表格的更好文档。

trans-unit.source: Better docs on what the “core” NewsItem fields are.
trans-unit.target: 关于“核心” NewsItem字段是什么的更好的文档。

trans-unit.source: Better documentation about Schemas, SchemaFields, Attributes, and how they relate.
trans-unit.target: 关于Schemas、SchemaFields、Attributes以及它们之间的关系的更好的文档。

trans-unit.source: Browse your site… everything should work except that streets with previously cryptic names like “99” or “87” will now have a more recognizable full name, eg. “State Route 99” or “Interstate 87”.
trans-unit.target: 浏览您的站点...一切正常，除了以前具有诸如“ 99”或“ 87”之类的隐名的街道现在将具有更易于识别的全名，例如。“ 99号州际公路”或“ 87号州际公路”。

trans-unit.source: Bugs fixed
trans-unit.target: 错误修复

trans-unit.source: By default, one API key per user. 3 was kind of silly.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,每个用户只有一个API密钥。3是有点傻。

trans-unit.source: Changed URLs used by the schema_filter view, so some bookmarks may break. (Ticket # 266)
trans-unit.target: 更改了 schema_filter 视图使用的 URL,因此一些书签可能会被破坏。(Ticket#266)

trans-unit.source: Clarify behavior of email alerts.
trans-unit.target: 澄清电子邮件提醒的行为。

trans-unit.source: Core models and views for OpenBlock (hyperlocal news for Django)
trans-unit.target: OpenBlock的核心模型和观点(Django的超本地新闻)

trans-unit.source: Custom login view now works when going to admin site, and is compatible with (uses same cookies as) django.contrib.auth. Ticket #174
trans-unit.target: 自定义登录视图现在可以在进入管理站点时使用,并与django.contrib.auth兼容(使用相同的cookie)。票数 #174

trans-unit.source: De-hardcoded more URLs.
trans-unit.target: 去掉硬编码的更多网址。

trans-unit.source: Deprecate log_exception(), the logging module actually does that already
trans-unit.target: 废弃log_exception(),实际上日志模块已经做到了。

trans-unit.source: Discussion is on the ebcode google group or the #openblock channel on freenode.
trans-unit.target: 讨论是在ebcode Google组 或freenode上的#openblock频道上进行的。

trans-unit.source: Do not just try to easy_install or pip install ebpub. It has a lot of specific dependencies which can’t/shouldn’t be captured by setup.py.
trans-unit.target: 不要不只是尝试的easy_install或PIP安装ebpub。它具有很多特定的依赖关系，这些依赖关系不能由setup.py捕获。

trans-unit.source: Document
trans-unit.target: 文件

trans-unit.source: Document how to get the 2010 census files instead of 2009.
trans-unit.target: 记录如何获得2010年的普查档案,而不是2009年。

trans-unit.source: Documentation
trans-unit.target: 文件资料

trans-unit.source: Documentation about comments and flagging of NewsItems. Ticket #252
trans-unit.target: 关于新闻项的评论和标记的文档。票据 #252

trans-unit.source: Don’t barf constructing richmaps url if there are no matching newsitems
trans-unit.target: 如果没有匹配的newsitems，请不要拒绝构建richmaps网址

trans-unit.source: Factored out the georss scraper’s point-parsing code into a
trans-unit.target: 将georss刮板的点解析代码分解为一个

trans-unit.source: Filtering NewsItems by Block no longer causes 500 error.
trans-unit.target: 按区块过滤NewsItems不再导致500错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix #281, wrong schemas shown on big map page.
trans-unit.target: 修正#281,大地图页面显示的模式错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix #282, missing items on place detail pages
trans-unit.target: 修正#282,地方详情页缺失的项目

trans-unit.source: Fix 500 error on newsitem.geojson, ticket #38
trans-unit.target: 修正newsitem.geojson上的500个错误,票号38。

trans-unit.source: Fix 500 error when user doesn’t exist.
trans-unit.target: 当用户不存在时修复500错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix KeyError when an Attribute references a non-existent Lookup.
trans-unit.target: 当一个属性引用一个不存在的Lookup时,修复KeyError。

trans-unit.source: Fix error in NewsItem.objects.by_attribute() with many-to-many lookups: looking for [3,47] was finding any number starting with 3 or ending with 47.
trans-unit.target: 修正NewsItem.objects.by_attribute()中多对多查找的错误:查找[3,47]时发现任何以3开头或以47结尾的数字。

trans-unit.source: Fix error on FilterChain.add(key, lookup) when key isn’t a SchemaField.
trans-unit.target: 当键不是SchemaField时，修复FilterChain.add（key，lookup）上的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix filtering by location and date on big map page.
trans-unit.target: 修正大地图页面中按地点和日期过滤的问题。

trans-unit.source: Fix missing AJAX timeouts on “save place” button, thanks Tim Shedor. Ticket #269
trans-unit.target: 谢谢Tim Shedor，在“保存位置”按钮上修复了丢失的AJAX超时问题。机票＃269

trans-unit.source: Fix rare error when we have a Block instance but its block range doesn’t match the block range regex. Known example: 1600-7-1600-9 Hanover Blvd. in Columbia, MO.
trans-unit.target: 当我们有一个Block实例但其块范围与块范围正则表达式不匹配时，修复罕见错误。已知示例：1600-7-1600-9 HanoverBlvd。在密苏里州哥伦比亚市。

trans-unit.source: Fixed double-logging of scrapers to the console.
trans-unit.target: 修正了刮刮乐对控制台的双重记录。

trans-unit.source: Fixes to example crontab, thanks Tim Shedor
trans-unit.target: 修正了crontab的例子,感谢Tim Shedor。

trans-unit.source: For help, you can try the ebcode group: http://groups.google.com/group/ebcode or look for us in the #openblock IRC channel on irc.freenode.net.
trans-unit.target: 如需帮助，您可以尝试ebcode组：http ://groups.google.com/group/ebcode 或在irc.freenode.net上的#openblock IRC频道中寻找我们。

trans-unit.source: For installation instructions and other documentation, see http://openblockproject.org/docs/ (or the .rst files in the docs/ directory).
trans-unit.target: 有关安装说明和其他文档，请参见 http://openblockproject.org/docs/（或docs /目录中的.rst文件）。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the documentation or the project website.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 文档 或项目网站。

trans-unit.source: Funding for the initial creation of Everyblock and the ongoing development of OpenBlock has been provided by the Knight Foundation (http://www.knightfoundation.org/).
trans-unit.target: 奈特基金会（http://www.knightfoundation.org/）为Everyblock的最初创建和OpenBlock的持续开发提供了资金。

trans-unit.source: Generic rss scraper is now a ListDetailScraper and RssListDetailScraper subclass. Ticket #242
trans-unit.target: 通用 rss scraper 现在是 ListDetailScraper 和 RssListDetailScraper 子类。Ticket #242

trans-unit.source: Generic rss scraper is now the basis for
trans-unit.target: 通用的rss搜刮器是现在的基础。

trans-unit.source: Group blocks by street on “choose a block” page, ticket # 263
trans-unit.target: 在“选择街区”页面上按街区分组街区，票号263

trans-unit.source: Handle importing locations in other projections than 4326. Thanks Karen Tracey. Refs #214.
trans-unit.target: 处理导入4326以外的其他预测中的位置。谢谢 Karen Tracey.参考文献#214。

trans-unit.source: ImproperCity
trans-unit.target: 不正当城市

trans-unit.source: In this release, there are some changes to the Block model and the import script, which combine to give you better search results and geocoding if you reload your blocks data. To do so:
trans-unit.target: 在这个版本中,对区块模型和导入脚本进行了一些修改,这些修改结合在一起,如果你重新加载你的区块数据,就可以得到更好的搜索结果和地理编码。要做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Instead, see the full documentation at http://openblockproject.org/docs/install/index.html which includes links to pip requirements files and instructions on preparing your system.
trans-unit.target: 相反，请参阅http://openblockproject.org/docs/install/index.html上的完整文档，其中包括指向pip要求文件的链接以及有关准备系统的说明。

trans-unit.source: Licensed under the GNU General Public License version 3, except where otherwise noted.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有说明,否则采用GNU通用公共许可证第3版进行授权。

trans-unit.source: Location import (both command-line and admin UI) no longer blows up when re-importing the same Locations.
trans-unit.target: 在重新导入相同的位置时,位置导入(包括命令行和管理界面)不再爆炸。

trans-unit.source: Location import in admin UI now runs in background.
trans-unit.target: 管理界面的位置导入现在在后台运行。

trans-unit.source: Logout form was broken by bad template name. Fixed.
trans-unit.target: 登出表单因模板名称错误而被破坏。已修复。

trans-unit.source: Logout now redirects you to whatever page you were viewing.
trans-unit.target: 注销现在会将你重定向到你正在浏览的任何页面。

trans-unit.source: Lookup.objects.get_featured_lookup_for_item(newsitem, attribute_key)
trans-unit.target: Lookup.objects.get_featured_lookup_for_item(newsitem,attribute_key)

trans-unit.source: Made schema_filter the default view of Schemas, ticket #272
trans-unit.target: 让schema_filter成为Schemas的默认视图,票据 #272

trans-unit.source: Make
trans-unit.target: 作る

trans-unit.source: Map icon URLs for db.Location and streets.PlaceType can now be relative to STATIC_URL
trans-unit.target: db.Location 和 streets.PlaceType 的地图图标 URL 现在可以相对于 STATIC_URL。

trans-unit.source: Move full_geocode() to ebpub.geocoder.base; it was in an obscure place
trans-unit.target: 将full_geocode()移到ebpub.geocoder.base中,它原本在一个不显眼的地方。

trans-unit.source: Moved one obscure template tag, {% get_locations_for_item %}, from ebpub.widgets.templatetags into ebpub.db.templatetags.recaptcha_tags. Templates using it will now need to do {% load eb %}.
trans-unit.target: 将一个不知名的模板标签{% get_locations_for_item %}从ebpub.widgets.templatetags移到了ebpub.db.templatetags.recaptcha_tags。使用它的模板现在需要做{% load eb %}。

trans-unit.source: Moved some NewsItemListDetailScraper functionality up into BaseScraper, so it’s more widely usable.
trans-unit.target: 将一些NewsItemListDetailScraper功能移到了BaseScraper中，因此它的使用范围更加广泛。

trans-unit.source: Moved the friendlydate template filter from ebpub.db.templatetags.eb into ebpub.db.templatetags.dateutils, where it seems to belong.
trans-unit.target: 将 friendlydate 模板过滤器从 ebpub.db.templatetags.eb 移到了 ebpub.db.templatetags.dateutils 中,看来是属于它的。

trans-unit.source: Moved the recaptcha template tag from ebpub.neighbornews.templatetags into ebpub.db.templatetags.recaptcha_tags. Templates using it will now need to do {% load recaptcha_tags %}.
trans-unit.target: 将ebpub.neighbornews.templatetags中的recaptcha模板标签移到ebpub.db.templatetags.recaptcha_tags中。使用它的模板现在需要做{% load recaptcha_tags %}。

trans-unit.source: Neighbornews schemas now have chartable
trans-unit.target: Neighbornews模式现在有了可图表化的功能。

trans-unit.source: New Features in 1.2
trans-unit.target: 1.2的新功能

trans-unit.source: New NewsItem.objects.by_request() method for filtering based on eg. user privileges.
trans-unit.target: 新增NewsItem.objects.by_request()方法,用于基于用户权限的过滤。

trans-unit.source: New get_schema_manager(request) method for filtering based on current request, with an extensibility hook too.
trans-unit.target: 新的get_schema_manager(request)方法,用于根据当前请求进行过滤,也有一个可扩展的钩子。

trans-unit.source: NewsItem
trans-unit.target: 新闻项目

trans-unit.source: Nicer map controls thanks to Frank Hebbert, ticket #225
trans-unit.target: 更好的地图控制,感谢Frank Hebbert,票号225。

trans-unit.source: Nieghbornews schemas now have specific templates for the schema_filter view.
trans-unit.target: Nieghbornews模式现在有特定模板的schema_filter视图。

trans-unit.source: Now works with Postgresql 9.1, ticket #262
trans-unit.target: 现在可以和Postgresql 9.1一起工作,票号262。

trans-unit.source: OpenBlock
trans-unit.target: OpenBlock

trans-unit.source: OpenBlock 1.2.0 (Released 5/23/2012)
trans-unit.target: OpenBlock 1.2.0 (Released 5/23/2012)

trans-unit.source: OpenBlock began life as the open-source code released by Everyblock.com in June 2009. Originally created by Adrian Holovaty and the Everyblock team, it is now developed as an open-source (GPL) project by OpenPlans, at http://openblockproject.org.
trans-unit.target: OpenBlock最初是Everyblock.com在2009年6月发布的开源代码。最初由Adrian Holovaty和Everyblock团队创建，现在由OpenPlans作为http：// openblockproject的开源（GPL）项目进行开发。 .org。

trans-unit.source: OpenBlock is a web application and RESTful service that allows users to browse and search their local area for “hyper-local news” - to see what’s going on recently in the immediate geographic area.
trans-unit.target: OpenBlock是一个Web应用程序和RESTful服务，允许用户浏览和搜索其本地区域中的“超本地新闻”，以查看最近在该地理区域中发生的事情。

trans-unit.source: Optional ReCaptcha on the user-contributed (“Neighbornews”) add/edit forms.
trans-unit.target: 用户提供的（“邻居”）添加/编辑表单上的可选ReCaptcha。

trans-unit.source: Other
trans-unit.target: 其他

trans-unit.source: Problems can be reported to the issue tracker.
trans-unit.target: 问题可以报告给问题跟踪器。

trans-unit.source: Python API documentation for all(?) of ebpub, ebdata, obadmin, obdemo packages. Ticket #159.
trans-unit.target: 所有(?)ebpub,ebdata,obadmin,obdemo 包的 Python API 文档。Ticket #159.

trans-unit.source: RSS feed URLs fixed to use settings.EB_DOMAIN rather than the sites framework for getting the root URL. For consistency with the rest of OpenBlock.
trans-unit.target: RSS feed URLs固定为使用settings.EB_DOMAIN而不是网站框架来获取根URL。为了与OpenBlock的其他部分保持一致。

trans-unit.source: Re-import blocks with the –reset option (that’s important!), via either the admin UI or the command line … see http://openblockproject.org/docs/install/geodata.html#streets-blocks
trans-unit.target: 通过管理界面或命令行，使用–reset选项重新导入块（这很重要！）……请参阅http://openblockproject.org/docs/install/geodata.html#streets-blocks

trans-unit.source: Remove bogus breadcrumbs from schema_filter page; ticket #270
trans-unit.target: 删除schemma_filter页面的虚假面包屑;票号270

trans-unit.source: Removed ebdata/retrieval/scrapers/new_newsitem_list_detail.py, which wasn’t used anywhere.
trans-unit.target: 删除了ebdata / retrieval / scrapers / new_newsitem_list_detail.py，该文件未在任何地方使用。

trans-unit.source: Removed ebpub/streets/blockimport/tiger/import_blocks2010.py. Census 2010 files are now supported by the main import_blocks.py script.
trans-unit.target: 删除了ebpub/streets/blockimport/tiger/import_blocks2010.py。2010年人口普查文件现在被主import_blocks.py脚本所支持。

trans-unit.source: Removed foreign keys EmailAlert.block and SavedPlace.block; instead they now have geometries which can be used to find a nearest block. This makes it safer to re-load your blocks data if you need to. Running migrations will take care of existing alerts and saved places, but you can’t safely downgrade if you change your mind; make database backups as always! (Ticket #257)
trans-unit.target: 删除了外键EmailAlert.block和SavedPlace.block; 取而代之的是，它们现在具有可用于查找最近块的几何形状。如果需要，这使得重新加载块数据更加安全。运行迁移将处理现有警报和保存的位置，但是如果您改变主意，则无法安全地降级。像往常一样进行数据库备份！（票号257）

trans-unit.source: Removed item.intersecting from Widgets context; it was never documented properly. Instead use the new
trans-unit.target: 从Widgets上下文中删除了item.intersecting;它从来没有被正确记录下来。取而代之的是使用新的

trans-unit.source: Removed mystery fields Schema.grab_bag, Schema.grab_bag_headline, Schema.intro. (Ticket #232)
trans-unit.target: 删除了神秘字段Schema.grab_bag,Schema.grab_bag_headline,Schema.intro。(Ticket #232)
删除了safe_id_sort_reversed模板标签；使用for循环的reverse选项，例如。{占itemlist | safe_id_sort中的项目％的百分比％}

trans-unit.source: Removed the
trans-unit.target: 删除了

trans-unit.source: Removed the EB_MEDIA_ROOT and EB_MEDIA_URL settings; now use django’s normal MEDIA_ROOT and MEDIA_URL instead.
trans-unit.target: 删除了EB_MEDIA_ROOT和EB_MEDIA_URL设置；现在使用Django的常规MEDIA_ROOT和MEDIA_URL代替。

trans-unit.source: Removed the old map javascript since we’re now using openblockrichmap.js everywhere.
trans-unit.target: 删除了旧的地图javascript，因为我们现在到处都在使用openblockrichmap.js。

trans-unit.source: Removed unused NewsItem.block field, part of ticket #93.
trans-unit.target: 删除了未使用的NewsItem.block字段,这是93号票的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Renamed a bunch of template tag functions to match the name of the tag, eg. “do_filter_url()” is now “filter_url()”. This makes the API docs easier to read; it doesn’t affect templates, only code that imports those functions directly - and there problably is none of that.
trans-unit.target: 重命名了一堆模板标签功能以匹配标签的名称，例如。“ do_filter_url（）”现在是“ filter_url（）”。这使API文档更易于阅读；它不影响模板，仅影响直接导入这些功能的代码-可能没有一个。

trans-unit.source: Rest API: Allow searching by multiple types (schemas).
trans-unit.target: Rest API。允许通过多种类型(模式)进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: Run migrations, as described above
trans-unit.target: 如上所述,运行迁移

trans-unit.source: Schema.allow_flagging
trans-unit.target: Schema.allow_flagging

trans-unit.source: Schemas now have an
trans-unit.target: 计划表现在有一个

trans-unit.source: Schemas with allow_charting=False were shown on the schema_filter view, but not on its map. Fixed schema_filter_geojson so now they show up on map too.
trans-unit.target: 在schema_filter视图中显示了allow_charting=False的模式,但在地图上没有显示。修正了schema_filter_geojson,所以现在它们也会显示在地图上。

trans-unit.source: Search form now searches Places too.
trans-unit.target: 搜索表格现在也可以搜索地方。

trans-unit.source: Sensible defaults on most DateFields and DateTimeFields, can still be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 大多数DateFields和DateTimeFields的合理默认值,仍然可以被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Should be possible to run OpenBlock at a URL prefix now; removed all hardcoded URLs. Ticket #90.
trans-unit.target: 现在应该可以在URL前缀处运行OpenBlock;删除了所有硬编码的URL。票号90。

trans-unit.source: Shut down your scrapers
trans-unit.target: 关闭你的刮刀

trans-unit.source: Start your scrapers again.
trans-unit.target: 再次启动你的刮痧器。

trans-unit.source: Store suffixes on streets with names like ‘Wilson Park’; fixes some geocoding failures.
trans-unit.target: 将后缀存储在名称如“威尔逊公园”的街道上；修复了一些地址解析错误。

trans-unit.source: Street names properly normalized on input (ticket #166)
trans-unit.target: 街道名称在输入时正常化(166号票)

trans-unit.source: Support multiple types of Yahoo maps, due to olwidget upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 由于olwidget升级,支持多种类型的雅虎地图。

trans-unit.source: The website should remain operational during this process, though some pages may briefly give errors during the process, and URLs for highways will change to include the prefix.
trans-unit.target: 在这个过程中,网站应保持运行,尽管在这个过程中,一些页面可能会短暂地给出错误,高速公路的URL会改变,包括前缀。

trans-unit.source: This package is part of OpenBlock. Originally developed for EveryBlock.com.
trans-unit.target: 这个包是OpenBlock的一部分。最初是为EveryBlock.com开发的。

trans-unit.source: Too many to mention, but here are some:
trans-unit.target: 太多了,但这里有一些。

trans-unit.source: Upgrade Notes
trans-unit.target: 升级说明

trans-unit.source: Upgrade jquery to 1.7.1.
trans-unit.target: 升级jquery到1.7.1。

trans-unit.source: Upgrade jquery-ui to 1.8.17.
trans-unit.target: 升级jquery-ui到1.8.17。

trans-unit.source: Use query params instead of weird URIs for schema_filter view, ticket # 266.
trans-unit.target: 在schema_filter视图中使用查询参数而不是奇怪的URI,ticket#266.

trans-unit.source: User admin UI now shows Profiles and API keys inline.
trans-unit.target: 用户管理界面现在可以在线显示配置文件和API密钥。

trans-unit.source: User-contributed content (“neighbornews”) now has edit and delete forms.
trans-unit.target: 用户提供的内容（“邻居”）现在具有编辑和删除表单。

trans-unit.source: User-uploaded images now supported for NewsItems, and enabled for the
trans-unit.target: NewsItems现在支持用户上传的图片,并启用了 "新闻 "功能。

trans-unit.source: We now use the primary street name for blocks loaded from US census TIGER data, instead of whichever one we see last, which may be an alternate name. Issue #278
trans-unit.target: 现在,我们使用从美国人口普查TIGER数据中加载的街区的主要街道名称,而不是最后看到的那个,可能是一个备用名称。问题 #278

trans-unit.source: When using a too-old python version, our setup.py scripts now give a more informative error, instead of SyntaxError due to a
trans-unit.target: 当使用太旧的python版本时,我们的setup.py脚本现在会给出一个更有信息含量的错误,而不是由于语法错误而导致的SyntaxError。

trans-unit.source: Workaround for getting profile when request.user is a LazyUser instance.
trans-unit.target: 当 request.user 是 LazyUser 实例时获取 profile 的变通方法。

trans-unit.source: You can now safely re-import blocks data. In fact, this is highly recommended, you’ll get better geocoding results due to fixes for #264 and #278. Use the “–reset” option to “import_blocks_tiger”.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以安全地重新导入块数据。实际上，强烈建议您这样做，由于＃264和＃278的修复，您将获得更好的地理编码结果。使用“ –reset”选项来“ import_blocks_tiger”。

trans-unit.source: address-extraction fallback now looks in all tags that look like text.
trans-unit.target: 地址提取回退现在可以在所有看起来像文本的标签中查看。
允许用户将NewsItems标记为垃圾邮件或不适当的应用程序,以及一个管理界面;见

trans-unit.source: block_import_tiger can now be safely re-run on the same file, it won’t create duplicate blocks anymore.
trans-unit.target: 现在可以在同一文件上安全地重新运行block_import_tiger，它将不再创建重复的块。

trans-unit.source: boolean to toggle moderation flagging per schema. Allowed by default on the
trans-unit.target: boolean,用于切换每个模式的节制标记。默认情况下,允许在

trans-unit.target: ebpub.db.bin

trans-unit.source: ebpub.geocoder.base.full_geocode() now has a convert_to_block argument, factored out from ebdata.retrieval. If True, this tries to disambiguate bad blocks on good streets by rounding down to the nearest block, eg. converting ‘299 Wabash St’ to ‘200 block of Wabash St.’ May help geocoding when eg. census data doesn’t quite match reality.
trans-unit.target: ebpub.geocoder.base.full_geocode（）现在具有从ebdata.retrieval中分解出来的convert_to_block参数。如果为True，则通过四舍五入到最接近的街区来消除歧义，从而消除街道上的不良街区。将“ 299 Wabash St.”转换为“ 200 Wabash St.街区” 例如，可能有助于地理编码。人口普查数据与实际情况不太吻合。

trans-unit.target: ebpub.moderation
